Argentina , Bolivia , Brazil , Colombia , México , Peru , Venezuela ( Göllner-Scheiding 1978a , 1983 ); Paraguay * NEW COUNTRY RECORD.

Pall and Coscarón (2012) mentioned Buenos Aires and Corrientes, but they did not give a bibliographical reference or a list of material from these provinces. They did not mention Mexico in the distribution of the species, and they misspelled a locality in Misiones province as ‘ Caraguay ’ instead of ‘ Caraguatay ’ .
